溫.definition: warm; lukewarm; to warm up; (bound form) temperature; (bound form) mild; soft; tender; to review (a lesson etc); (TCM) fever; epidemic; pestilence (old variant of 瘟[wen1])

溫切斯特.definition: Winchester (town in south England, capital of former kingdom of Wessex)

溫吞.definition: tepid; lukewarm; (fig.) apathetic; half-hearted; sluggish; mild-tempered

溫家寶.definition: Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013

溫宿.definition: Onsu nahiyisi (Wensu county) in Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区[A1 ke4 su1 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

溫宿縣.definition: Onsu nahiyisi (Wensu county) in Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区[A1 ke4 su1 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

溫居.definition: to have a housewarming party; to celebrate moving into a new home

溫嶺.definition: Wenling, county-level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

溫嶺市.definition: Wenling, county-level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

溫州.definition: see 溫州市|温州市[Wen1zhou1 Shi4]

溫州市.definition: Wenzhou, prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province 浙江省[Zhe4jiang1 Sheng3]

溫布爾登.definition: Wimbledon (district of southwest London); Wimbledon Championships (tennis)

溫布爾登網球公開賽.pinyin: wēn bù ěr dēng wǎng qiú gōng kāi sài

溫床.definition: hotbed; breeding ground; fig. breeding ground for crimes or sedition

溫故知新.definition: to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects); to recall the past to understand the future

溫故而知新.definition: to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects); to recall the past to understand the future

溫文爾雅.definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated

溫柔.definition: gentle and soft; tender; sweet (commonly used to describe a girl or woman)

溫江.definition: Wenjiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan

溫江區.definition: Wenjiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan

溫泉縣.definition: Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang

溫泉蛋.definition: onsen tamago; hot spring egg (soft-boiled egg cooked slowly in hot spring water)

溫玉.definition: onsen tamago; hot spring egg (soft-boiled egg cooked slowly in hot spring water) (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 温玉 "ontama", which is an abbr. for 温泉玉子 "onsen tamago")

溫理.definition: to review (a lesson etc); to bring back to one's mind

溫網.definition: Wimbledon Championships (tennis); abbr. for 溫布爾登網球公開賽|温布尔登网球公开赛[Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4]

溫縣.definition: Wen county in Jiaozuo 焦作[Jiao1 zuo4], Henan

溫良恭儉讓.definition: temperate, kind, courteous, restrained and magnanimous

溫酒.definition: to warm up wine; wine served warm, generally referring to Chinese wine such as 黃酒|黄酒[huang2jiu3] or 白酒[bai2jiu3]

溫飽.definition: to have enough food and warm clothes; adequately provided

溫馴.definition: docile; meek; harmless; moderate and obedient; tame

溫體肉.definition: meat that is not refrigerated after the animal is slaughtered
